preqs: Students must have passed two units from the following: MKG2402 or MKW2402 and MKG2420 or MKW2420 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {MKF3121, MKT312, MKT3121, MKW3121%}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKB2402, MKG2402, MKP2700, MKP2701, MKW2402} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}

description: The development of corporate marketing strategies; marketing planning procedure; evaluation and control in marketing planning;  international case studies in corporate marketing planning and strategy; concepts of product management; designing a product strategy; monitoring planning/marketing.
